product_name: REI Nalgene Holiday Wide-Mouth Loop-Top Water Bottle - 32 fl. oz.
long_description: Celebrate the winter season with the REI Nalgene Holiday wide-mouth loop-top water bottle. It's a must-have for camping or campus! Made of Eastman Tritan(TM) copolyester, the bottle is completely BPA-free and is dishwasher safe (top rack only). Tritan copolyester provides excellent impact resistance and is suitable for both warm and cold beverages. Wide mouth makes it easy to fill without spilling. REI Nalgene Holiday wide-mouth water bottle has a convenient loop-top design so you'll never lose the lid. Please note: not recommended for use in oven or microwave.
short_description: Celebrate the winter season with the REI Nalgene Holiday wide-mouth loop-top water bottle. It's a must-have for camping or campus!
